14_7_0101040163050063: The bear appears docile for the time being.

wise to take advantage of his current mood.
14_10_0139070163004100: You know that bears can't talk!
14_11_0139080163000000: Hi there!  I represent Ditto Realty.  We have some LOVELY properties that are PROVEN bargains.  We know that's true, because we've sold them so many times.
14_12_0201090163000000: Beyond the bear, the cave seems to continue.  The bear blocks the way.
14_13_02010a0163000000: An eerie luminescence emanates from a chamber deeper within the cave.
14_14_0300050163000000: A very large bear rears up as you approach.  It looks hungry and dangerous.
14_15_03000b0163001b43: As your eyes adjust from sunlight to darkness, you examine the interior of this eerie cavern.  You sense something moving off to your right.
